name: Solitaire - The #1 Card Game
description:
Solitaire, also known as Klondike Solitaire or Patience, is a beautiful and relaxing single player card game that is fun, easy to play, and helps you keep your mind sharp.

Test your skills in this FREE solitaire card game. Earn crowns by completing Daily Challenges and become a King!

SPECIAL FEATURES
- Quick finish auto-complete option
- Beautiful, dynamic graphics
- Exciting daily challenges
- Customizable card faces, card backs, and backgrounds
- Smart Hints and Auto Hints option
- Draw-1 or Draw-3 cards mode
- Unlimited deals, hints, and undos
- Left-handed mode
- High scores and personal statistics
- Winning deals option - play deals with at least one winning solution

HIGHLIGHTS
- Play offline - no network required
- Switch between Landscape and Portrait mode
- Play on any device (phone & tablet friendly)
- Single tap or drag & drop to move cards
- Multiple languages supported
